alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee; Mississippi; Phillips; St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued February 02 at 1:58PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations of three tenths to six tenths of ice. Up to one inch of snow and ice accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas and Southeast Missouri. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep extra blankets, food, water and a flashlight in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crittenden; Lee; Mississippi; Phillips; St. Francis
